bibl.title: A Greek-Demotic Temple Archive from Edfu Dating to the Reign of Ptolemy VIII.
bibl.note: Rustafjaell's Papyri. - P. Haun. Inv. 407. - The Size of the Archive. - The Archaeological Context. - Description of the Three Papyri now in Copenhagen [P. Haun. Inv. 407 (119/8 BC); 409 (131 BC); 410 (ca. 131 BC)]. - Conservation. - The Missing Parts of P. Haun. Inv. 407.
bibl.seg: Kim Ryholt, A Greek-Demotic Temple Archive from Edfu Dating to the Reign of Ptolemy VIII.

Rustafjaell's Papyri. - P. Haun. Inv. 407. - The Size of the Archive. - The Archaeological Context. - Description of the Three Papyri now in Copenhagen [P. Haun. Inv. 407 (119/8 BC); 409 (131 BC); 410 (ca. 131 BC)]. - Conservation. - The Missing Parts of P. Haun. Inv. 407.
